definition: according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Then they could stay at home and look after the children — and the animals.
sentences.chinese: 于是，女人便能守在家中，照顾孩子，还能照管动物。

sentences.english: Besides working in the fields, they also tend a rubber plantation and orchard.
sentences.chinese: 他们除了下地干活之外，还照管橡胶园和果园。

sentences.english: Of course Celia will have custody of the children.
sentences.chinese: 当然茜莉娅会照管孩子们。

sentences.english: She recommended her baby to the care of an old woman.
sentences.chinese: 她把婴儿托付给一位老太婆照管。

sentences.english: The player makes the stroke, looks up and sees the flagstick being attended.
sentences.chinese: 这名球员在击球后才发现在有人在照管旗杆。

sentences.english: German troops are based in neighbouring Kunduz province, and have oversight of Takhar.
sentences.chinese: 照管塔哈尔省的德军军队驻扎在邻近的昆都士地区。

sentences.english: As a result of the plague, much land was left untended and there was a terrible shortage of labour.
sentences.chinese: 鼠疫导致了大片土地无人照管和劳动力极度匮乏。

sentences.english: I stand in the opening, and the sheep pass under me into the stockade .
sentences.chinese: 当我站在这里，羊在我的照管下进入圈里。

sentences.english: He was very hardworking, and the farm always prospered under his care.
sentences.chinese: 他非常勤劳，而且农场在他的照管下蒸蒸日上。

sentences.english: If anyone does not know how tomanage his own family, how can he take care of God’s church?
sentences.chinese: 人若不知道管理自己的家，焉能照管神的教会呢？

sentences.english: The more women look in their glass, the less they look to their house.
sentences.chinese: 女人照镜越多，照管家庭事务就越少。

sentences.english: The old man lives alone in neglect.
sentences.chinese: 这个老人孑然一身无人照管。

sentences.english: For such matters as ritual vessels, there are the functionaries.
sentences.chinese: 陈设礼器之类的事，自有有关人员照管。

sentences.english: Children are easy to go awry without parental control.
sentences.chinese: 孩子没有父母的照管容易走上邪路。

sentences.english: He's very good at caring for sick animals.
sentences.chinese: 照管生病的动物，他很有一手。

sentences.english: I confided my house to the neighbor while I was touring.
sentences.chinese: 旅游期间，我把房子托给邻居照管。

definition: to look after/to attend to/to have in care
to tend/to take care of sb
to nurse/to look after/to watch over/(old) hospital nurse
to take care of/to show consideration/to attend to/to look after
to look after (elderly parents)/to serve/to support
to look after/to tend (one's crops, garden, livestock, pets etc)/to repair
to attend to the needs of (an invalid, disabled person etc)/caregiver
